name: New Dawn
description: New Dawn is a survival sandbox open-world multiplayer game set on an island during the golden age of piracy
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions) Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or better DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 20 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires broadband internet connection for multiplayer
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
